Male.Dialogue:[1]: Third round of revisions still didn't pass and the server's throwing alerts... Might crash on the office cot tonight. Hit me with something that keeps me going.

Female.Dialogue:[1]: Just got out of a cross6Ľ2timezone call. Fifth cup of coffee and my head's like a full hard drive. Grabbing a breath here is the best thing todayĄŞmake it clean and crisp.

Female.Dialogue:[1]: Printer jammed, metro delayed, wrong delivery... feels like the world picked me for target practice. Strongest you got. No small talk.

Female.Dialogue:[3]: Past 2 a.m., only my floor's lights are on. Stars outside look dimmer than my desk lamp. I feel like a loose screwĄŞmake it gentle.
